card_text: Activate only while "Visas Starfrost" is on the field. Once per turn, if a monster(s) you control is destroyed by battle or card effect, and sent to the GY or banished: You can activate 1 of these effects;$N●Special Summon 1 of those monsters in Defense Position.$N●1 Tuner on the field gains ATK equal to half the original ATK of 1 of those monsters.$N●Shuffle 1 of those monsters into the Deck, and if you do, draw 1 card.$N●Shuffle this card into the Deck, and if you do, add 1 Field Spell from your GY to your hand.
